short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tab manager that links to canvas courses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tab manager that allows you to link tabs to Canvas courses.

This extension lets you save your tabs and tab groups and load them later.
You can also link it to Canvas and load your classes from there.
Additionally, it can change your new tab page to load your tabs there.
